ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
HIV.C.DE56Not on ARTSex partner's HIV treatment status - Not on ART
HIV.C.DE57On ART less than 6 monthsSex partner's HIV treatment status - On ART less than 6 months
HIV.C.DE58Partner has suspected low adherence to ARTSex partner's HIV treatment status - Partner has suspected low adherence to ART
HIV.C.DE59Partner is not virally suppressedSex partner's HIV treatment status - Partner is not virally suppressed
HIV.C.DE60Partner is virally suppressed and has been on ART for 6 months or moreSex partner's HIV treatment status - Partner is virally suppressed and has been on ART for 6 months or more

title.value: Sex partner's HIV treatment status Codes

description.value: Codes representing possible values for the Sex partner's HIV treatment status element

display.value: Partner has suspected low adherence to ART
Partner is virally suppressed and has been on ART for 6 months or more
